Cafea e ok, PERSONAL GROAZNIC, majoritatea personalului este in regula, mai putin 2 angajați, este un baiat cu ochelari, inalt si masiv si cu parul brunet.
Locuiesc in blocul din care face parte cafeneaua, va spun sincer ca si eu am lucrat ca barista si ospatar si stiu ce insemna sa fii stresat in astfel de job uri dar pe cuvant ca nu am vazut om atat de ignorat, nervos, dificil!
O data mi am luat cafea si cred ca au refolosit cafeaua din portafiltru (parte espresor ului de unde curge cafeaua).
… – afișați
0
0

worst service ever!!! If you see a big guy with glasses and short brown hair please avoid this place. This guy should not be allowed to work with the public.
Firstly I asked for a coffee and told him that I only got cash so he would know to veryfi the change. He told me on a nervous voice that he dosen't have cash and if I wanna pay with cash in this century I'm too old to drink coffe there!!! I strongly recommend to fire this guy immediately

Decided to have a morning coffee here because of the very nice place from outside. But i felt very uncomfortable because the best sunny place (in a cold autumn morning) where i wanted to sit outside was busy by Batista's coffee and cigarettes, like she was the guest, not me, as a customer.The first and the last time I visited this nice place

O locatie superba! Servirea de 1000 se steluțe! Cele mai bune băuturi din oras, va spune asta fata care chiar a vizitat localuri!
Prajituri gustoase, băuturi dupa reteta tradiționala si personalul mai mult decat profi!

A devenit o tradiție venirea aici! Felicitari si mulțumiri lui Mihai si doamnei care ne-a servit acum 2 zile!

A nice, cozy bar to drink a coffee or some other drinks. The place is nice especially at night when the lights are on.
